snippet: Federal safety regulators have cited the owners of the fertilizer plant in West, Tex., that blew up in April, but they have not publicly announced the action because the agency’s public affairs staff has been furloughed by the government shutdown.
abstract: Federal safety regulators have cited the owners of the fertilizer plant in West, Tex., that blew up in April, but they have not publicly announced the action because the agency’s public affairs staff has been furloughed by the government shutdown.

headline.main: Safety Agency Cites Texas Plant in Explosion
